entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
